class.name: mrs_rviz_plugins/Sphere
class.description: Display tool for visualizing mrs_msgs/Sphere messages.

class.name: mrs_rviz_plugins/Bumper
class.description: Display tool for visualizing mrs_msgs/ObstacleSectors messages.

class.name: mrs_rviz_plugins/PoseWithCovarianceArray
class.description: Display tool for visualizing mrs_msgs/PoseWithCovarianceArrayStamped messages.

class.name: mrs_rviz_plugins/TrackArray
class.description: Display tool for visualizing mrs_msgs/TrackArrayStamped messages.

class.name: mrs_rviz_plugins/NamedSetGoal
class.description: Publish a goal pose for the robot. After one use, reverts to default tool.

class.name: mrs_rviz_plugins/ControlTool
class.description: Uav control tool. Implements mrs_uav_status functionality.

class.name: mrs_rviz_plugins/StatusDisplay
class.description: Shows all the information, that mrs_uav_status provide.
